title: ‘Physical building of WhatsApp University’: Satire on viral video of Galgotias University students
content:
Scenes from WhatsApp University foundation laying ceremony at Gala Ghot Diya University. Enjoy. #ViksitBharat#GalgotiaUniversity #UrbanMaxwell pic.twitter.com/fSsZWDNmad— Dr.Medusa (@ms_medusssa) May 2, 2024


A viral video of Galgotias University students unable to explain the motive behind their protest against Congress has drawn laughter and criticism on social media. In a video posted by Aaj Tak (below), the students are seen protesting against inheritance tax, and “urban naxals”, among others. However, upon being quizzed by journalist Ashutosh Mishra, the students were unable to explain the reason for protesting.#Congress के खिलाफ वेल्थ डिस्ट्रीब्यूशन-कथित इन्हेरिटेंसी टैक्स के मुद्दे पर छात्रों का प्रदर्शन लेकिन ज्यादातर को न मुद्दे पता थे ना वजह। कुछ बैनर भी ठीक से नहीं पढ़ पाए। देखिए कांग्रेस मुख्यालय की ओर प्रदर्शन करने चले छात्रों के गजब जवाब।#ReporterDiary | (@JournoAshutosh) pic.twitter.com/ystudZDqYm— AajTak (@aajtak) May 1, 2024
